description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the secure boot security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-37969):

1. Download and apply the relevant updates provided in the KB articles listed below.
2. Restart your system after the installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This fix addresses vulnerabilities associated with untrusted pointer dereference, enhancing the secure boot measures on affected Windows versions.
- For manual installation, you can download update packages from the links below:
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems: [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
  - Windows 10 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems: [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
- Ensure to check the system build number compatibility with the updates listed above.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is running the appropriate Windows version and build numbers specified.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the updates.
